Definition: Standard measure of conduction through a material. This value applies to the opaque section of the roof.
Color correction factor for surfaces. From ASHRAE CLTD - 1.0 if dark colored or light in an industrial area. 0.83 if permanently medium colored. 0.65 if permanently light colored.
An overall approximation of the roof construction type
Used to calculate skylight area. Percent of façade taken up by glazing.
The glazing construction type associated with a given roof type.
